attributes.additional_details:
You will  be aware that the Council of Europe of which we are a member, "urges member states" to "ensure that no one is discriminated against for not having been vaccinated, due to possible health risks or not wanting to be vaccinated."
As the leader of this country you are duty bound to protect the rights and freedoms of the people of this nation. We call upon you  pull the country away from a sinister ‘new normal’ where people must prove their medical status in order to access services.
attributes.background: We  call upon you to pass a Medical Freedom Bill which actively protects the freedoms of every individual in this country and ensures that no individual can be discriminated against  based on their vaccination status.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
